description:
Welcome to the second edition of Porto On Rails! 
This edition will occur in the XING Portugal facilities, in Matosinhos, and all the lectures will be in Portuguese. 
AGENDA: 
18:30 – Check-in & networking
19:00 – “Construindo seu próprio Markdown personalizado, com Ruby” por Gabriel Mazetto
19:30 – Pizza & networking
20:00 – TBA
20:30 – Networking
name: Porto On Rails #2
